item.title: Firstpost
item.description: Zach Keim, Cybersecurity Student Hello, I am currently a Junior at Purdue University studying cybersecurity. I wish to have a career in the field of information security focused on defensive and counteractive measures against both simple and advance threats related to vulnerability mitigation, exploit patching, incident response, and policy management. From a young age I have always been fascinated by technology. I chose cybersecurity mainly because it encompasses all aspects of IT and is a constantly changing environment.
